Do You Have To Remove Your Clothes To Succeed On Onlyfans

Onlyfans has been a popular creators' online platform for some time and a booming one to boot.

10 Unique Places to Get OnlyFans Subscribers and Lure Them to Your Account

Estimated Reading Time: 2 min 56 sec

OnlyFans offers plenty of diversity when it comes to content creation. It’s become the go-to platform for all types of content, including DIY content, health, fashion, travel, beauty, sex education, etc. For each creator, OnlyFans is the place to get rewarded for all the work you put into creating content for your fans.

As a creator, you earn through Pay-per-view content and fan subscriptions. However, to start earning money for your creativity and talent, you first have to get subscribers to your OnlyFans page. You have to work harder to get people to like and pay for your content. 

The trick is how to make those subscribers come. That’s why we’ve created this guide to help you expand your reach and gain subscribers and the money well deserved for your content.

Let’s dig in.

Make an appointment now

Driving More Subscribers to Your OnlyFans

Whether you just started your OnlyFans or have been wooing subscribers for years, the rule of the game remains the same. The only way to win OnlyFans subscribers is to come up with unique strategies for your account. 

Here are some tips for you: 

  • Remember What OnlyFans is All About

When you log in to OnlyFans, what’s the first thing that comes to mind? For every OnlyFans creator, having an OnlyFans page means having fans subscribe and pay for your posts. A follower goes to OnlyFans to find a creator who can address their pain points and provide a lasting solution. They expect creators to keep producing the content they’re looking for because it helps to address their pain points. 

In a twist, while you and your fans need each other, you need your fans more because they fuel your success. They’ll subscribe to you because they like you and enjoy the unique content you post, and are willing to pay for it. 

If your followers wanted any content, they could easily get it from other sites online. But they come to OnlyFans because of you and your content. So, remember that OnlyFans is about the subscriber and what they want. 

  • Take the First, Bold Step

To gain more fans, you have to go out there and lure them in. OnlyFans is like a war zone where only the smart one wins. Each creator is competing to have a piece of the pie. This is a war you have to win if you want to succeed.

Take the bold step and claim your piece. It will be challenging but worth your time in the long run. Show your prospects that your page is the best, and they should subscribe to it. So get out and do your best to ensure potential subscribers know that you are the one they should choose.

  • Put More Effort into Social Media Campaigns

Organic growth is very important when looking to succeed on OnlyFans. Make people notice your OnlyFans by promoting it on social networks using the methods we highlighted in our previous articles. Be more interactive and engaging, and people will likely subscribe.

Social media exposes you to many prospects, and posting consistently will make them want to be associated with you. Your social proof should be your selling point. People notice you because there’s something you’re offering that others don’t.  An active social platform lets people know you’re worth getting a following and ultimately subscribing to. 

Make an appointment now

Where to Find OnlyFans Subscribers

You’ll only find OnlyFans subscribers if you know where to look. Here are the places to get potential subs: 

1. Behind the Very Hashtag You Aren’t Using

Your hashtag is the calling card you should include in your posts to let your audience know what you’re offering them on OnlyFans. Reveal who you are, your OnlyFans niche, and the hashtags you need them to post. 

Search the hashtags every day for your prospects to interact with and follow. You can leave the hashtags out of your post. This will help you gain followers and other like-minded individuals.

2. In the Comments

The comments section carries many people who can easily become loyal subscribers. Their taking time to comment on your posts should tell you that they’re interested parties who just need a push to convert.

Some make lewd comments, and you need to weed them out quickly. For those who show interest in your posts, check out their profiles to know them better. Don’t react to their comments, though.  Go to their social profiles and comment on their posts as well. Doing this will spark interest, and that’s when you start building connections with them. 

3. In Your Direct Messaging

A person who takes the time to reach you in your inbox is definitely motivated to become your fan. DMs are never a waste of time like many presume. A 3-minute session with a prospect can turn them into a subscriber. 

If you’re too busy to talk, drop them your OnlyFans link and politely excuse yourself. If you can spare three minutes for a prospect, you have a greater chance of getting them on board.

4. Liking and Commenting on Other Creators’ Posts

Other creators in your niche can be your opportunity to gain more subs on social media. Wherever you are – Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, Reddit, etc., ensure you like and comment on other creators’ content. 

Every creator has amassed a following that may be interested in your niche. Through your comments, they’ll know that you exist when they see your DM, comment, or link. Explain why you wrote them, so they don’t mark you as spam.

5. Scrutinize Your Posts to Spot Potential Subs who Like Your Posts

Although it seems tedious to scrutinize the comments, likes, and DMs on your posts, your efforts can pay off if you commit. Your posts attract prospects and fellow creators. Those who like your posts are likely to subscribe to your OnlyFans.

Once you spot them, drop them a link to enjoy a free trial on your OnlyFans. This is to thank them for becoming your fan. Comment on their posts and start a meaningful conversation.

6. View Your Posts in Secret

There’s this group of followers that crushes on you in secret or anonymity. These people will silently watch and read your content and leave without a word. They are the hardest to reach because they never reveal themselves.

To draw such people out, you should make them an offer they can’t resist. Something like “I have created this exclusive post for all my crushes and will only send it through DM to everyone who likes this post.” 

You want to ensure they do all they can to read your content and finally redirect them to your OnlyFans page. Eventually, you’ll turn them into paying subscribers.

7. They Watch Your Videos But Don’t Know About Your OnlyFans

This is a group of fans who visit YouTube, TikTok, and other platforms you post your videos to. They watch our video content but have no idea about your OnlyFans page, probably because of the various restrictions on these sites.

When you create your videos, embed a URL line for link pages like All my links or linktree. Just have the link as a small image in the bottom right corner. Scribble a note like Find me on all my links @yourname to guide people on how to find your information if they like your content.

8. They Subscribe to Cheap or Expensive OnlyFans

The group which subscribes to cheaper OnlyFans doesn’t want to spend a lot on your OnlyFans but is a potential buyer of your content. They tend to subscribe to creators who are cheaper. You don’t have to lower your subscription fee. Just offer them free trials to get them to want to subscribe to you.

There is this other group that subscribes to expensive OnlyFans. These people feel good about spending more cash because they believe your content has more value. This will prompt you to revise your subscription rates to determine if it fits their budget before reaching out to them. 

You’ll also need to gauge your content’s quality and what such subscribers expect from you. They might end up liking your content and subscribing to you.

9. On that Social Channel You’re Not Registered

A lot of social media platforms are springing up every now and then. Some may seem to have little potential at first, but they constantly evolve to become more popular. Don’t look at them and see limited opportunities. Instead, tap into those channels and grab your potential subscribers from their feeds.

Always explore what’s trending now, and you may land fans yet to be discovered. Share snippets of your posts on OnlyFans and your profile link to lure people to your page.

10. Create Desire and Expectation in Fans

Converting your followers into paying subscribers can be challenging if you don’t have a smart promotional strategy. Your audience wants unique content that makes them yearn for more. 

To address their needs, you’ll have to tweak your content for social consumption to stir up an expectation about what your OnlyFans is like. Create excitement and suspense as you leave them wondering what your next post will be like.

Show potential subs that what you are presenting now is only a taste of what you create for your subscribers. They need to know that they’ll have better content if they become your loyal subscribers.

Make an appointment now

Promoting Anonymously to Get OnlyFans Subscribers

You can also gain more OnlyFans subscribers if you promote your page anonymously.

Here’s how.

1. Create an Alias

Creating an alias means not using your real name and other personal details in your posts, on your profile, and bio. Rather, you create an alias that will become your OnlyFans identity. Make this new character appealing and humorous.

2. Set Up New Social Media Profile

Utilize social networks like Instagram, Reddit, Facebook, TikTok, Twitter, etc., to promote your content and OnlyFans profile. With new alias social network profiles, you can effectively promote your page and redirect users there. 

Also, create an email account for signing up on different social channels and keeping the contacts syncing off. Utilize geo-blocking for regions with people who know you.

3. Have 2 OnlyFans Pages

To enhance the content promotion, utilize two OnlyFans accounts. One should be a free account using your alias name, while the other remains paid. Use the free account to post your exclusive post snippets. This will be your bait to lure people to your paid OnlyFans page.

All your premium posts should be posted on your paid profile. This is where you make money from sharing content. Ensure to post regularly and on schedule. Any irregularities will make you lose the subscribers you already have. 

Interact with your followers on both accounts to maintain your connections. Doing this will increase opportunities of getting more subscribers – and money.

For OnlyFans account management services, apply here.

4. Utilize Influencer Marketing

Today’s content/product consumer believes the word of an influencer more than anything else. Influencers have a massive following on every social network. One word from them and your OnlyFans will be streaming with followers willing to subscribe to your content.

If you leverage the services of an influencer, your profile and content will be out there instantly. They can give your OnlyFans profile a shout-out and help to market your page at a fee. That’s what big brands do to gain a following.

You don’t need to give your personal details to an influencer. They will market your page adequately, even without mentioning your name.

5. Utilize an OnlyFans Marketing Agency

An Onlyfans marketing agency like Fandafia OnlyFans Agency can help you promote your OnlyFans profile. It has expert teams to get you more subscribers, more comments on your posts, and more content-sharing avenues. You should leverage the services of Fandafia. The agency offers a range of marketing options that will bind people to your content to ensure your page’s constant growth. Its sales team ensures your fans know about your OnlyFans.

Fandafia ensures your account experiences long-term growth. It constantly generates new fans while retaining existing subscribers. Whether you want to remain anonymous or not, they will promote your page to all the audiences online thanks to the agency’s online exposure and fan access.

They’ll audit your account to determine its strengths and weaknesses. This knowledge helps boost your organic social media performance by expanding your reach. Through its DM management, you’ll be able to retain your existing fan base and attract more prospects.

Make an appointment now

How to Retain Your OnlyFans Subscribers: 10 Sure Tips

While you work hard to gain as many subs to your OnlyFans, keeping them subscribed for the long term is important. Retaining your subscribers is key to your long-term growth and success. 

Here are ways of retaining the subscribers you’ve worked so hard to get.

1. Offer Unique Content

While it takes time, offering unique content to your loyal subscribers sets you apart from the rest of the crowd in the content creation realm. Your subscribers have confidence that you’ll give your best, just as they expect.

When you offer something your subscribers can’t find elsewhere, you’ll get them too engaged to think of leaving your Onlyfans page. Personalized content keeps your loyal subscribers yearning to see what you’ll be bringing next.

Exclusive content makes your subscribers remember you fondly. Such connections will last for a long time.

2. Engage Them on a Personal Level

While it might appear difficult to achieve personal engagement daily, the more you interact with fans, the more they’ll likely stick around longer. The difference between you and other creators is how you make your subscribers feel. Your role as an OnlyFans creator is to unleash those feelings and surpass your competition.  

Nothing beats subscriber retention like one-on-one engagement. Your subscribers will feel valued and special. OnlyFans is quite competitive, so you have to go the extra mile to retain your current subscribers.

3. Send Exclusive DMs

Surprising your subscribers with an exclusive DM  will keep them happy. Create nice content with videos and pictures to develop lasting connections with them. It can be a way of showing your appreciation for subscribing to you. Personalize your DMs by including the subscriber’s username.

Get exclusive account management services by applying here.

4. Giveaways

Do you know why people flock to McDonald’s? It’s because of their freebies. You can also make your fans love you by constantly offering them free things. A free trial, a free video, or a free post every Wednesday will do.

5. Celebrate Significant Occasions with Them

Subscribers are happy when they’re appreciated. If they’ve stayed with you for over a year, you may appreciate the time they’ve spent subscribing to your posts. Sometimes you’ll notice them sharing something special in their life. It could be an anniversary, birthday, and more. Make time to congratulate them personally.

You could also give your page a festive mood based on the particular holiday or season. This will show them you’re very committed to delivering fresh, updated content.

6. Turn Your Page into a Fun and Exciting Venture

OnlyFans is all about entertaining and educating your subscribers. Your page doesn’t have to look like an engraved banner that puts off any new subscribers. It’s going to drive them away, one by one. This can seem hard to accomplish, but it’s part of your strategy that will make you unique and a more experienced creator in the eyes of your fans and other content creators hence retaining them.

7. Stream Live Content

Going live sets you apart as a dedicated OnlyFans creator. Live streaming can boost your bottom line. You can reward your subscribers with a live show weekly or monthly. This will create an unrivaled sense of community. Your fans will want to stay subscribed to you for longer. They will want to stay on to continue viewing what you bring in your consequent live shows. 

8. Leave a Comment on Your Subs’ Social Media Posts

Many of your OnlyFans subscribers have their own social media pages. Interacting with them on these pages will establish long-term connections with potential subs. When you show interest in your fans beyond OnlyFans, they feel part of your circle. They can be your dedicated ambassadors who will make your page and posts go viral.

9. Let them know What to Expect in Your Coming Posts

No subscriber wants to miss out on exciting content. Making them aware of what you will post in the coming month keeps them glued to your page. Make sure you post unique, exciting content they’ve yet to see. Give them tips, and live experiences, and add some humor to make them laugh.

10. Don’t Forget the Tender Loving Care (TLC)

Tender-loving care is the best bold step to making your subscribers happy. You don’t have to give one-on-one attention; make them feel your care. This way, they’ll be confident of keeping subscribing to you and your brand.

Overview of How to Get Subs to Your OnlyFans

  1. Post your best videos and photos during your OnlyFans promotion
  2. Schedule your posts to when your potential subscribers are active online
  3. Research in advance for your new content ideas
  4. Respond to likes, DMs, and comments from prospects and loyal subscribers
  5. Post more visual content
  6. Respond to other creators’ posts
  7. Send them freebies
  8. Create killer content
  9. Engage Influencers and marketers
  10. Create alias accounts to promote your OnlyFans

Takeaway

There are many ways to get subscribers to your OnlyFans. Leverage the value of your content and available promotional avenues to reach out to potential subscribers online.

Remember, it’s through hard work that you’ll gain more subscribers. Leave nothing to chance as you exploit our guide. You have more than enough avenues to work with. If you need help, you know you can count on our agency’s input.
